name: La Duena - Petit Robusto No. 11
additionalNotes: La Duena is a collaboration by Jaime Garcia of My Father cigars fame and Pete Johnson of the highly respected Tatuaje brand. This medium to full-bodied Nicaraguan treat is an homage to Janny Garcia, daughter of 'Pepin' Garcia and sister to Jaime, all three of which run the My Father company. Featuring notes of earth, leather and pepper, La Duena reminds us that a cigar blend is nothing without a great team behind it.Â
